# UseFocusToggleProps.trackSource property

{% callout type="caution" variation="normal" %}

This API is deprecated:

This parameter will be removed in a future version use `trackRef` instead.

{% /callout %}

**Signature:**

```typescript
trackSource?: Track.Source;
```
